front.title: DNSSEC OK buffer minimum size requirment and error handling

abstract.t: RFC3226 mandated support for EDNS0 in DNS entities claiming to support either DNS Security Extensions or IPv6 address records. This requirement was motivated because these new features increase the size of DNS messages. If EDNS0 is not supported fall back to TCP will happen, having a detrimental impact on query latency and DNS server load.
